timeline.bodyText: Can't we make the price differences larger instead of adding decimals?
timeline.author: mtopolnik

replies.bodyText: Generally, we can. However it is currently hard-coded in TradeSource which is used on couple of different places and in demos etc. We can probably make it configurable but it needs to be documented etc. @jbartok you made refactoring related to TradeSource - what do you think about it? Can you take care of it?
replies.author: olukas
